mapper.update:
update Login
Token = #{token,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Username = #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Password = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LastLogin = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LastLoginIP = #{lastLoginIP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LevelID = #{levelID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsEnabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
Imprest = #{imprest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Overdraft = #{overdraft,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PaymentCycle = #{paymentCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shenzhenaccountid = #{shenzhenaccountid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where LoginID = #{loginID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Login set Token = #{token,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Username = #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LastLogin = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LastLoginIP = #{lastLoginIP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LevelID = #{levelID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IsEnabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, Imprest = #{imprest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Overdraft = #{overdraft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PaymentCycle = #{paymentCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shenzhenaccountid = #{shenzhenaccountid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where LoginID = #{loginID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.Login AS l(NOLOCK) WHERE l.Username=#{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND Password=#{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.Login AS l(NOLOCK) WHERE l.Username=#{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
